notes: Mar 2026 run (22544862765): Closed Feb issue #1450, created new March 2026 monthly issue (number pending - search for '[Repo Assist] Monthly Activity 2026-03'). Commented on #605 (script reference resolution - SetDotnetRoot uses SdkDiscovery.versionAt for global.json; FCS GetProjectSnapshotFromScript may still use own SDK discovery for framework refs). Commented on #847 (Fantomas update UX - suggested opt-in fsharp/checkFantomasUpdate command approach). Issues still to comment: #481 (go-to-def decompiled), #486 (decompiler throw null), #525 (AST model), #654 (snap installs), #705 (debugging), #712 (fsl/fsy support), #733 (workspaceFolders), #871 (raspberrypi startup), #900 (LSIF), #1316 (extract TipFormatters), #1338 (dotnet binary FreeBSD). Open Repo Assist PRs: #1465 (v0.84.0 changelog), #1482 (RemoveRedundantQualifier regression test), #1483 (unnecessary parens regression test), #1484 (FSAC0002 false positive test, draft), #1486 (Better OTel by Krzysztof-Cieslak).
